LanguageData.VNPE_NutValveDesc: Switches nutrient paste flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.VNPE_DrainDesc: Drain vat content. This will remove any unwanted ingredients from the vat.
LanguageData.VNPE_NutrientDripperThresholdDesc: By default, nutrient drippers will feed bed occupants when their hunger goes below 26%. You can tweak that value with this slider.
